name: Vreal
description:
Vreal is the first broadcast platform for VR entertainment. Party up with friends and explore VR gameplay content together, all from your own perspectives. Vreal is now in Early Access; try us for free!

FEATURES
  • Watch VR recordings with up to four friends on HTC Vive and Oculus Rift, from anywhere inside a game world.
  • Hang out, chat, and draw inside VR content for Tilt Brush, Arizona Sunshine, GORN, SUPERHOT, and Surgeon Simulator: Experience Reality - with more games to come!
  • Need to grab a snack? Pause the recording!
  • Choose a fun avatar and loom over your friends as a giant panda.
  • Use virtual cameras inside VR to create fun videos to share!
